translate.english: set one's mind at rest / feel relieved

examples.example: 请您放心，我一定会出色地完成这项任务。

translate.english: Please rest assured that I will definitely complete this task excellently.

examples.example: 您就放心吧，这件事交给我绝对没问题。

translate.english: You can rest assured. There is absolutely no problem for me to handle this matter.

examples.example: 您放心好了，我会全力以赴达成目标的。

translate.english: You can rest assured. I will go all out to achieve the goal.
